tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.15
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayGSL False isArrayGST False isArrayFROST False output_data_ATB $output_data_ATB name SAGA.climate_tools.15 GSL $GSL GST $GST FROST $FROST NIVAL_TEMP $NIVAL_TEMP TREE_TEMP $TREE_TEMP prefer $prefer response $response outputType_ATB $OutputSection_ATB.outputType_ATB transmissionMode_ATB $OutputSection_ATB.transmissionMode_ATB

param.name: GSL
param.label: Growing Season Length
param.help: Growing season length given as number of days of a year. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png, tiff

param.name: GST
param.label: Mean Temperature
param.help: Mean temperature of the growing season. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png, tiff

param.name: FROST
param.label: Frost occurence
param.help: Frost occurence as binary factor. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, png, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_ATB
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

tool.help: Calculates the thermal belts based on mean temperature and length of the growing season.
